title: Line Follower Transporter Robot
description: Developed a Line follower transporter robot that able transport small items from one point to another efficiently, making it ideal for industrial automation, warehousing, or educational purposes.

title: Door Security System with Password
description: Developed a password-protected door security system using the ATmega8535 microcontroller. The system features a keypad for password input, an LCD display for user interface, and an electric lock mechanism controlled by the microcontroller.
